Posts.Content: Quote: Originally Posted by youngmummy18 Hi, about 3 months ago I realized i had a small hard lump underneath the skin in my armpit. Yesterday this lump was slightly painful so I called the doctors. Today it seems fine but after searching the internet yesterday I have concerns this may be a bit more serious that I thought. Any advice would be much appreciated as I'm only 18 and very panicked now. Thanks x I have a similar lump but am much older than you. I think it is a lymph node. It could be swollen from an infection but it can also be more serious. I hope you have a doctor look at it. I am going on Monday to a breast doctor but like I said I am 54 so breast cancer is a concern. If you look up axillary lymph nodes you will find some information but really I've been looking for days and have learned nothing but a bunch of worthless terminology. Bottom line is that if the doctor thinks it's suspicious, he will do a biopsy.
Posts.Title: armpit lump!
